Observed at: North Mountain 2:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this afternoon and then to 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
